sources.title: 1937 Die Gelbe Flagge
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1937 Mit Hans Albers  Die gelbe flagge

metadata.Plot: Adventure thriller involving a quarantined ship off the South American coast, a gang of thugs,and to top it off, a raft of cannibals deep in the jungle.Dashing hero Albers comes to the rescue.
metadata.Writer: Fred Andreas, Helmut Brandis, Otto Linnekogel
metadata.Actors: Hans Albers, Olga Tschechowa, Dorothea Wieck
